articles.title: The Hidden Geometry That Could Explain the Universe - SciTechDaily
articles.description: How can the tiniest particles and the vast structure of the universe be explained using the same kind of mathematics? This puzzle is the focus of recent research by mathematicians Claudia Fevola (Inria Saclay) and Anna-Laura Sattelberger (Max Planck Institute…
